alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 13 at 2:45PM CDT until October 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SALINE JEFFERSON AND GAGE COUNTIES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM CDT FRIDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SALINE JEFFERSON AND GAGE COUNTIES... The National Weather Service in Omaha/Valley has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from noon to 7 PM CDT Friday. * Affected Area...In Nebraska, Saline, Jefferson and Gage. * Winds...Northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph through 7 PM today. West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph between noon and 7 PM Friday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 16 percent today. As low as 25 percent Friday afternoon. * Impacts...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in any activities that could start a fire. Outdoor burning is not advisable.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
